original_text: These people could not find any lists to show who their ancestors were. Because of this, they could not serve God as priests. Priests had to be descendants of Aaron. 7: These people could not find any lists to show who their ancestors were. Because of this, they could not serve God as priests. korean_text: 이 사람들은 계보 중에서 자기 이름을 찾아도 찾지 못하였으므로 그들을 부정하게 여겨 제사장의 직분을 행하지 못하게 하고

sentences.original_text: These people could not find any lists
sentences.korean_translation: 이 사람들은 어떤 목록도 찾을 수 없었습니다

sentences.original_text: to show who their ancestors were
Because of this
they could not serve God as priests
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 제사장으로 하나님을 섬길 수 없었습니다

sentences.original_text: Priests had to be descendants of Aaron
